Reviews.Title: “A comfortable and clean hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel sisto comfortable clean hotel nice updated bathrooms resort type hotel lot amenities offers base returning day sightseeing hotel located north west section suburbia city shops pharmacy walking distance found double peaceful quiet despite hotel near train station hospital center rome historic sites taxi cornelia metro station passes sites staff helpful speak english value money nice coffeetea facilities especially restaurant bar

Reviews.Title: “Far from the center and close to the Vatican”
Reviews.Author: Tiago2635
Reviews.Content: hotel center public transport night breakfast ok employees friendly speaking english hotel sisto close vatican recommend hotel closer center
